hash.before-save:
selected_versions = @issue.custom_field_value(@field_for_requested_versions)
puts "================= selected_versions: #{selected_versions}"
if @issue.tracker_id == @demand && requested_versions_changed? && selected_versions != [''] versions = Version.find(selected_versions) if versions.any? { |version| version.fixed_issues.blank? } raise RedmineCustomWorkflows::Errors::WorkflowError, l(:warning_cw_tracker_missing_fixed_issues) end end
hash.name: GERCONT_validator_avoid_version_missing_issues
hash.author: diogo.neiva@saude.gov.br
